LessonActivity.LessonName: Fill in the Morph with -AN Words
LessonActivity.Instructions: Read the paragraph and fill in the blanks with appropriate words from the word bank.

Paragraphs.text: The ancient _____________ would _____________ orders to his subjects. Some people tried to _____________ what would happen next. However, there was a _____________ in his policies that confused everyone. The _____________ of justice was slow but inevitable.
